SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.RMI.remote.game

Interface ServerGameCommandsInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerGameCommandsImpl
public interface ServerGameCommandsInterface extends Remote
The server uses this interface to receive commands from the clients.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    This method is used to draw a card from the table

    This method is used to place a card on the player field

    This method is used to place the starter card.
    void
    syncMeUp (@NotNull String nick)
    This method notifies that the client needs to resync with the server; the player will expect all the information about the game.

  • Method Details

    • setStarterCard

      void setStarterCard (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, boolean isRetro) throws RemoteException, GameStatusException
      This method is used to place the starter card.
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who is setting the starter card.
      isRetro - True if the card placed on its retro, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs.
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to place the starter card.

    • setObjectiveCard

      void setObjectiveCard (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, int cardId) throws RemoteException, IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException, GameStatusException
      This method is used to set the personal Objective card.
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who is setting the personal objective card.
      cardId - The id of the card to set.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs.
      IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException - If the player tries to choose a card, that is not in the candidate objective list.
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to set the personal objective card.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, int cardId, int x, int y, boolean isRetro) throws RemoteException, TurnsOrderException, IllegalCardPlacingException, NotInHandException, GameStatusException
      This method is used to place a card on the player field
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who is placing the card
      cardId - The id of the card to place
      x - The x coordinate of the card
      y - The y coordinate of the card
      isRetro - True if the card placed on its retro, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs
      TurnsOrderException - If the player is trying to place a card in the wrong turn
      IllegalCardPlacingException - If the player is trying to place a card in an illegal position
      NotInHandException - If the player is trying to place a card that is not in his hand
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to place the card

    • drawCard

      void drawCard (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, boolean fromVisible, @NotNull @NotNull PlayableCardType type, int cardId) throws RemoteException, IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException, TurnsOrderException, IllegalPickActionException, EmptyDeckException, MaxHandSizeException, GameStatusException
      This method is used to draw a card from the table
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who is drawing the card
      fromVisible - True if the card is drawn from the visibles, false otherwise
      type - The type of the card to draw
      cardId - The id of the card to draw
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs
      IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException - If the player can't draw a card
      TurnsOrderException - If the player is trying to draw a card in the wrong turn
      IllegalPickActionException - If the player is trying to draw a card that is not available to pick
      EmptyDeckException - If the deck is empty
      MaxHandSizeException - If the player has reached the maximum hand size
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to draw the card

    • setNumOfPlayers

      void setNumOfPlayers (@NotNull @NotNull String nick, int numOfPlayers) throws RemoteException, NumOfPlayersException, NotGodPlayerException, GameStatusException
      This method is used to set the number of players in the game at the beginning
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who is setting the number of players
      numOfPlayers - The number of players in the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs
      NumOfPlayersException - If the number of players is not valid
      NotGodPlayerException - If the player is not the god player
      GameStatusException - If the game is not in the right status to set the number of players

    • syncMeUp

      void syncMeUp (@NotNull @NotNull String nick) throws RemoteException
      This method notifies that the client needs to resync with the server; the player will expect all the information about the game.
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player who needs to resync
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs
